TopicTitle: My small, efficient, reusable Duna Transfer Vehicle made its maiden voyage

Articles.Content:
Javascript is disabled. View full album

Made a small, efficient, reusable 3-man Duna transfer vehicle. It was pretty fun. I can post a .craft of "Red Fred" and "Rusty Trails" if anyone is interested, I probably won't supply the delivery vehicles though...
Nice, low cost mission. Personally i prefer to use bigger transfer vehicles, with nice, fat fuel reserve.
Yeah, I've played around with large cruiser-esque designs, and they're nice for not having to worry a lot while touring. Lately I've just been trying for minimal designs.
My ship is also bigger, but I'm quite impressed with how much you did with not much.
